name: Super Mario Sunshine Multiplayer
overview: A mod for Super Mario Sunshine written by Blastsoft Studios and requires the .NET Redistributable. A later modification by Mr. Brocoli called Multiplayer AllReds that is considered superior, but doesn't come with the source code available. Super Mario Sunshine is a game about beating Mario's imposter... But as every mate of a crew knows you can't finish such a big task alone. That's why this mod allows for a second Mario to log in, and become player 2! There is split screen and a minimalistic options menu.
